name: Elon Simulator - Spend Like A Trillionaire
name_original: Elon Simulator - Spend Like A Trillionaire
description:
'Elon Simulator' is an immersive 'Trillionaire Simulator' with dozens of fun mechanics and activities to engage in!

The year is 2030, and the Earth is starved for Lithium.
Good thing you have an ample supply of it, right outside your Private Luxury Space-Station!

As Elon, you can:
Smoke Weed (a lot)
Print your own money
Go 'Lithium Hunting' in your Flying SpaceCar (Then sell the lithium back to Earth for BILLIONS $$$)
Make MILLIONS while you sleep in real life...
Play on the Holo-Table
Become a TRILLIONAIRE
...and lots more....

All from the comfort of your gigantic Luxury Space station, which is headed to Mars for permanent residence!

You are Elon: the richest man in the Galaxy. And you can afford anything you want.

I made this game as a skills test and to pad my portfolio for future employers to see... and also to let people have fun in deep space with unlimited earning potential. Have fun!
